item.description:
Hi - Here are the details for our 1st Annual Wedeln Octoberfest Pub Crawl

Here is the bar list for October 18, 2008

Come join us as we crawl from Davis Sq to Harvard Sq to Central Sq. Invite all of your friends along!

Davis Sq.
1. Redbones / Underbones - 1:15 - 2:00
2. Burren 2:00 - 2:45
3. Sligo Pub 2:45 - 3:30
4. Joshua Tree 3:30 - 4:15

T- Ride to Harvard (Gives people a break) - Buy a prepaid Charlie Card for the T!

Harvard Square
5. Hong Kong 4:30 - 5:15
6. Plough and Stars 5:15 - 6:00
7. People's Republik 6:15 - 7:00

Central Square
8. Tavern in the Square 7:15 - 8:00

Pub Crawl shirts are on sale. When you RSVP - indicate your shirt size. It will be a long sleeve shirt!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be wearing Wedeln Pub Crawl shirts - Reserve yours today!
item.name: 1st Annual Wedeln Octoberfest Pub Crawl
